Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CalibreIdentifiable
    A tag interface for a generic Calibre object which: has an ID must be validated on load accepts a CalibrePlugin
    CalibreItem
    A class for a generic CalibreItemSupplier which: provides a way to call Events to this item
    CalibreItemSupplier
    A class for a generic CalibreIdentifiable which: can be converted to an ItemStack
    CalibreLocalized
    A generic Calibre object which has a localizable name.
    ItemEvents.BukkitDamage.Listener  
    ItemEvents.BukkitInteract.Listener  
    ItemEvents.BukkitSwapHands.Listener  
    ItemEvents.Damage.Listener  
    ItemEvents.Equip.Listener  
    ItemEvents.Interact.Listener  
    ItemEvents.ItemCreation.Listener  
    ItemEvents.SwapHands.Listener  
    ItemEvents.SystemEvent<S extends CalibreSystem<?>>
    An event which was called by a system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ItemEvents
    Contains all generic item events that a CalibreSystem can listen to.
    ItemEvents.BukkitDamage<L extends ItemEvents.BukkitDamage.Listener>
    Bukkit event-based version of ItemEvents.Damage.
    ItemEvents.BukkitInteract<L extends ItemEvents.BukkitInteract.Listener>
    Bukkit event-based version of ItemEvents.Interact.
    ItemEvents.BukkitSwapHands<L extends ItemEvents.BukkitSwapHands.Listener>
    Bukkit event-based version of ItemEvents.SwapHands.
    ItemEvents.Damage<L extends ItemEvents.Damage.Listener>
    Runs when an entity is damaged by another entity with an item.
    ItemEvents.Equip<L extends ItemEvents.Equip.Listener>
    Runs when an item is equipped by a player in any EquipmentSlot.
    ItemEvents.Event<T>
    The base class for all item events.
    ItemEvents.Interact<L extends ItemEvents.Interact.Listener>
    Runs when an item is left or right clicked.
    ItemEvents.ItemCreation<L extends ItemEvents.ItemCreation.Listener>
    Runs when an item is being created with CalibreComponent.createItem(Player, int).
    ItemEvents.SwapHands<L extends ItemEvents.SwapHands.Listener>
    Runs when an item is swapped from the main to offhand and vice versa.
    ItemEvents.UserEvent<T>
    The base class for all item events involving an item user.
